subdisciplines.name: Character Development
subdisciplines.description: The development of character traits and personalities in a screenplay.

subdisciplines.name: Dialogue
subdisciplines.description: The art of writing effective dialogue in a screenplay.

subdisciplines.name: Plot Development
subdisciplines.description: The development of story structure and plot in a screenplay.

subdisciplines.name: Scene Development
subdisciplines.description: The development of specific scenes in a screenplay.

subdisciplines.name: Structure
subdisciplines.description: The overall structure of a screenplay.
